name: Shady Puzzle: Super Awesome Compilation Edition!
name_original: Shady Puzzle: Super Awesome Compilation Edition!
description:
Shady Puzzle: Super Awesome Compilation Edition! is a puzzle game developed by LambdaMu Games. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by LambdaMu Games.
Shady Puzzle: Super Awesome Compilation Edition! is available on iOS.
